> One stego looks down to Night Shift making sure he's unharmed. =
He smiles and rubs her nose.

> "I'm okay. My friends are commn' back ta h=
elp me out."
>
> Meanwhile, another stego scouts the area where Night Shift=
 and Rat Trap had just fled. He had been with the family originally, and ap=
pears to be one of the oldest members of the herd. He picks up a familliar =
scent, yet not Night Shift, but the scent of another comrade, and follows i=
t. It leads him close to Ramulus. He spots the Maximal, and waits for his a=
pproach, quietly gurgling his growl, and lowering his head as if to try and=
 get him to follow him.

<NEW>

When the Stegosauras spotted Ramulus, the M=
aximal was at the scene of
the battle. He was in robot mode skulking around=
 the area, the smell
of gunpowder and burnt metal and smoke still hung in t=
he air like a
cloud. But for him it would seem that battle is over. There a=
re no
combatants, no explosions, and no bright flashes of light in the
dist=
ance. All is quiet, except for a strange gurgling growling sound.

Ramulus =
looked over at the rather strange acting Stegosauras. he gave
it a quizzica=
l look and tried to shoo it away. "Hey big fella, you
don't need to be arou=
nd here. It might not be safe."

Meanwhile he turned his radio on. "Rat Tra=
p, Nightshift. I am here at
the site wher you called us from, but I don't s=
ee you." There was a
cautious and confused timber to his voice. "I can see =
the battle you
were talking about, but there is no one left. It looks like =
half the
forest was set ablaze though."

(TAG)

Preston
